main.name: Josh Turner
main.description: I am a self-driven and motivated individual. When it comes to my work, I believe in simplicity and clarity. I am passionate about providing the best user-experience possible, whether through code or digital design
main.bio: I currently work remotely as a full-stack developer for a company in Columbus, Ohio, where I've worked for the last 12 years developing desktop and web applications for Ohio's DD community. I am an active learner of all things development-related and I love to spend time learning and growing in new technologies and skills through personal projects and freelance work.
main.contactmessage: Send me a message, I'd love to hear from you!

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the skills I have actively been using in recent projects, along with my level of comfort in each.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Knowledge gained in object-oriented programming, datastructures and algorithms, Big-O analysis, relational database design, MVC design pattern, networking, and other software development fundamentals.

roles.title: Desktop Application Developer
highlights: Developed client/server desktop applications utilizing PowerBuilder, VB.Net, and SQL Anywhere
Wrote an in-house application to facilitate continuous and fast automated builds with error handling and notifications
Responsible for setup and maintenance of development and testing environments
Responsible for application deployment and installation processes
Database administrator responsibilities including upgrade scripts, database installation, data recovery, and DDL design and development
Implemented SVN version control for all in-house applications
Received 'Innovation Award' for revolutionizing upgrade process by building intelligent and standardized upgrade SQL scripts for replicating environments
Wrote an updater application that moved the company from fully manual, on-site installations to fully remote, user-initiated upgrades
Saved the company hundreds of annual support hours and thousands of annual dollars through innovative software and design

roles.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
highlights: Developed multi-tier web applications utilizing HTML5, CSS, and Jquery on the front-end and WCF web services on the back end
Improved our C# back-end architecture by integrating atomic transactions and by making the session management logic more efficient
Installed and configured server-side components like PHP, mail servers, certificates, and IIS

projects.title: 'Binary Greek' Watchface for Samsung Galaxy Watch
Budgeteer Web Application
projects.category: Full-stack budgeting application (MySQL, VB.net, WCF, .Net MVC 2.0)

projects.title: CashTrack Web Application
projects.category: Budgeting application utilizing Ruby on Rails

testimonials.text: Josh, thanks for your great designs! They are beautiful and practical. You also have a knack for listening to what we want, and we really appreciate the fact that you give enough alternative designs and are always prepared to make modifications and tweaks according to our preferences. Keep up the good work!
